info.author: Ben Hayden
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Parses a lisp dialect using spark.
Simple macros.
Compiles to Python bytecode. Generates pyc, pyo files.
Full-featured interactive interpreter.
Based on Miles Egan's Lython.
info.keywords: lisp lython spark compile bytecode macro
info.name: Lython
info.summary: Lisp dialect compiler to Python byte-code
info.html_description: Parses a lisp dialect using spark. Simple macros. Compiles to Python bytecode. Generates pyc, pyo files. Full-featured interactive interpreter. Based on Miles Egan’s Lython.
